entry.dcterms:description: stratification, dwelling, settlement, profession, consumption, culture, second economy, origin, childhood, mobility, deviation, alcoholism, suicide, health; family relationships (nuclear and large), the 1986 block of ISSP; law-consciousness, tolerance; cultural stratification, relationships, family planning, the 1987 block of ISSP; households' expenditure structure, consumption habits, financial situation, income- and labour market situation, time budget; leisure time habits, habits of going to movie
